sentences.en: a group of children walking along in a line
sentences.cn: 排着队向前走的一群孩子

sentences.en: A thin, glistening thread of moisture ran along the rough concrete sill.
sentences.cn: 在粗糙不平的水泥窗台上有一条细细的发光水印。

sentences.en: Anthony picked himself up and set off along the track.
sentences.cn: 安东尼自己慢慢爬起来，又开始沿着跑道跑下去。

sentences.en: Come along, lad. Time for you to get home.
sentences.cn: 来吧，小伙子。你该回家了。

sentences.en: Come along, Osmond. No sense in your standing around.
sentences.cn: 快点儿，奥斯蒙德，你闲站着干什么。

sentences.en: Dangerous undertows make swimming unsafe along most of the coastline.
sentences.cn: 由于存在着危险的下层逆流，在大部分海岸线附近游泳都不安全。

sentences.en: Good luck is when an opportunity comes along and you're prepared for it.
sentences.cn: 好运就是当机会来临时，你早已做好了准备。

sentences.en: He slid his hand along her arm.
sentences.cn: 他的手顺着她的臂膀滑下。

sentences.en: I was chosen, along with twelve other artists.
sentences.cn: 我和其他12位艺术家一起被选中。

sentences.en: I was driving along, thinking about Chris.
sentences.cn: 我一边开车，一边想着克里斯。

sentences.en: Just hold tight to my hand and follow along.
sentences.cn: 抓紧我的手，跟着我。

sentences.en: Matthew had no drive. He coasted along on his good looks.
sentences.cn: 马修没什么雄心大志，就凭着自己的长相混饭吃。

sentences.en: She climbed the steps and proceeded along the upstairs hallway.
sentences.cn: 她爬上楼梯，顺着楼上的走廊走去。

sentences.en: She glanced anxiously along the line of faces.
sentences.cn: 她焦急地扫视着这一排面孔。

sentences.en: She looked up at me with pinpricks of sweat along her hairline.
sentences.cn: 她抬头看了我一眼，发际渗出细密的汗珠。

sentences.en: she'll be along soon.
sentences.cn: 她马上就来。

sentences.en: The truck was trundling along the escarpment of the Zambesi valley.
sentences.cn: 卡车沿着赞比西山谷的绝壁缓缓行进。

sentences.en: The wide road was blocked solid with traffic that moved along sluggishly.
sentences.cn: 宽阔的马路被缓慢前行的车辆堵得严严实实。

sentences.en: The young man led Mark Ryle along a corridor.
sentences.cn: 那个年轻人领着马克·赖尔沿走廊而去。

sentences.en: There are a multitude of small quiet roads to cycle along.
sentences.cn: 有很多可以骑车的宁静小路。

sentences.en: They set out in a westerly direction along the riverbank.
sentences.cn: 他们沿着河岸向西出发了。

sentences.en: we could head out along about six.
sentences.cn: 我们可能六点左右出发。

sentences.en: We were driving along Follyfoot Road.
sentences.cn: 我们沿着福莱福特路行驶。

phrases.tran_cn: (北美，非正式 或 方)大约（某特定时间或日期），…左右
沽名钓誉的；(在团体中)图虚名而不做工作的；逢场作戏；陪伴
在这个方向，朝这个方向
在那个方向，朝那个方向
v. 出现；一起来；陪伴；进步
（勉强）生活；进展；（使）前进；与…和睦相处

trans.tran_cn: 向前，进展，一起，到某处，越来越（好）

trans.tran_en: from one place on something such as a line, road, or edge towards the other end of it
